description: Try our easy to follow Pulled Pork Rolls with Apple Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rolls,High protein,Seafood free,Apple,Pork,Slow cooker,Pressure cooker,Slow cooked
name: Pulled Pork Rolls with Apple Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in pressure cooker set to browning (see tip). Add brown onion and garlic and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Remove netting from pork and pat rind dry with paper towel. Add to cooker and cook for 10 minutes, turning, or until browned all over. Combine chipotle sauce, mustard powder and 2 cups water in a bowl. Add to cooker with bay leaves.
Lock on lid and change setting to high pressure. Cook for 40 minutes.
Carefully release steam valve and remove lid. Transfer pork to a dish.
Change setting to simmer and cook sauce for 15-20 minutes or until thickened.
Meanwhile, remove rind from pork and discard. Shred pork meat using 2 forks and place into a bowl. Add 1 1/2 cups sauce to pork and stir to coat.
Combine crème fraîche, vinegar and mustard in a bowl. Add coleslaw, apple and spring onion and toss to combine. To serve, top roll bases with coleslaw, pork and roll lids.
